post.title: Tokino Sora Reaches 1 Million YouTube Subscribers
post.content:
Hololive's 0-generation VTuber Tokino Sora finally reached the 1 million YouTube subscriber milestone, making her the 30th Hololive member in general to receive such a milestone.

Sora revealed her twin tails look in her latest livestream Thursday, July 28. Her character illustrator Ordan took charge of the new hairstyle.

Aside from being one of the pioneer members of Hololive, Tokino Sora is also one of the ambassadors for Hololive Meet, bringing the agency's talents to various events worldwide.

She is also announced as a guest at the upcoming Crunchyroll Expo happening from August 5 to 7 at the San Jose McEnery Convention Center in California.

node.description: Annual virtual event happening on VRChat and online until August 28. Aside from being the biggest virtual asset marketplace, Virtual Market Summer 2022 has the biggest offering of activities for everyone.
